description: MainActivity source file for an Android TV frontend app, extending FragmentActivity to handle key events and manage UI interactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class for the Android TV frontend, handling UI setup and remote control input.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and prepares UI components.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events from the TV remote, including select, back, and enter buttons.
